function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious transmission of the novel SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus from animal species to humans","Impact":"Potential for a widespread outbreak of COVID-19 with severe respiratory tract infections","Mitigation":"Regulating and monitoring human-animal interaction, as well as implementing strict food safety measures","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing for identifying potential recombination events","People":"Individuals in close contact with animals, especially those involved in traditional medicine and food industries","Owner":"Government health authorities and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Recombination events in bat and pangolin-origin coronaviruses leading to the generation of new recombinants","Impact":"Potential emergence of new strains of coronaviruses with unknown pathogenicity and transmission characteristics","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to curb wildlife trade and reduce proximity of humans to potential reservoirs of coronaviruses","Technologies":"Genomic surveillance and characterization of coronaviruses in wildlife populations","People":"Wildlife handlers, traders, and individuals exposed to wildlife markets","Owner":"Environmental conservation and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential for mutations and evolution of the SARS-CoV-2 virus in human and animal hosts","Impact":"Increased likelihood of the virus becoming more transmissible, virulent, or resistant to existing treatments","Mitigation":"Global surveillance of virus mutations, enhanced biosecurity measures, and development of targeted antiviral therapies","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing for tracking viral mutations and developing specific antiviral drugs","People":"Public health authorities, medical researchers, and individuals in close contact with infected individuals or animals","Owner":"Global health organizations and research institutions"}]}
